meanings.definition: The territory or jurisdiction of a satrap.
meanings.sent1: The satrapies were vast lands ruled by the satrap.
meanings.sent2: The satrapies were divided into smaller regions for easier governance.
meanings.sent3: The satrapies were like puzzle pieces that the satrap had to fit together.
meanings.sent4: The satrapies stretched out like a colorful map under the rule of the satrap.
meanings.sent5: The satrapies were like pieces of a jigsaw puzzle, each with its own unique shape and color.

meanings.definition: The office or position of a satrap.
meanings.sent1: He aspired to hold the prestigious satrapies one day.
meanings.sent2: The satrapies required a person of great leadership skills.
meanings.sent3: Becoming the satrap meant taking on the responsibilities of the satrapies.
meanings.sent4: The satrapies were like a throne that only the chosen one could sit upon.
meanings.sent5: The satrapies symbolized power and authority in the ancient world.

meanings.definition: A province governed by a satrap.
meanings.sent1: The satrapies were regions under the direct rule of the satrap.
meanings.sent2: The satrapies were known for their unique customs and traditions.
meanings.sent3: Living in the satrapies meant following the laws set by the satrap.
meanings.sent4: The satrapies were like small kingdoms under the watchful eye of the satrap.
meanings.sent5: The satrapies were like mini empires with the satrap as their ruler.
